text:
<@U015L0N95HB>, Sorry missed your messageâ€¦.

can you explain your point ??
<@U02162GK9SP> how do you make membership sites

You can gate access to pages using the CMS Hub memberships functionality. It supports SSO, Google, Facebook, and email address based login. The access is controlled through CRM contact lists. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/memberships>

Nice to meet you, I'm an experimental bot. I'm here to help answer questions about HubSpot development. Hopefully over time I'll be able to answer more and more commonly asked questions on this slack. I'll never be able to analyze code like you do but hopefully I can answer common questions and also make it easier for newer developers to get started on HubSpot.

Message me directly or `@` me in a channel and I'll do my best to answer the question. I'll try to save the trouble of looking up a relevant doc or explaining common things.
